definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, people with alcoholic liver disease often have hepatitis C as well.
sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，人们往往与酒精性肝病和丙型肝炎。

sentences.english: To research the affect of tattoo eyebrow on the infection of viral hepatitis type C in women.
sentences.chinese: 研究纹眉在女性丙型肝炎病毒感染中的作用。

sentences.english: More than 350 000 people die from HCV-related liver diseases each year.
sentences.chinese: 每年有35万多人死于与丙型肝炎相关的肝脏疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the applicability of HCV serotyping.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨丙型肝炎病毒血清学分型的可行性。

sentences.english: This article introduces Professor Zhang Yunpeng's clinical experience in the treatment of chronic hepatitis C.
sentences.chinese: 介绍张云鹏教授治疗慢性丙型肝炎的临床经验。

sentences.english: Hepatitis C is a blood-borne virus.
sentences.chinese: 丙型肝炎是一种通过血液传染病毒。

sentences.english: Our country has high prevalence with chronic hepatitis C.
sentences.chinese: 我国是丙型肝炎的高发区。

sentences.english: The natural course of chronic hepatitis C varies considerably from one person to another.
sentences.chinese: 在自然慢性丙型肝炎有很大的差别从一个人到另一个。

sentences.english: HCV infection is curable using increasingly effective antivirals.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用有效的抗病毒药物，丙型肝炎是可以治愈的。

definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
